title: 1917년 Bates v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Alabama, AL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Bates v. State. 판결일: 1917-03-23. 법원: Alabama Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Bates v. State.
**판결일**: 1917-03-23
**법원**: Alabama Court of Appeals
**관할**: Alabama, AL

**판사**: Brown

## 변호인

W. L. Martin, Atty. Gen., for the State.

## 인용

- 74 So. 1006
- 16 Ala. App. 689

## 판결문 요약

The defendant was indicted for murder, and was convicted of manslaughter. The indictment follows the form prescribed by the statute, and the proceedings of the court shown by the record appear to be regular. Further than this, nothing is presented for review, and the judgment will be affirmed. Affirmed....

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
